Description: Located in Attapeu City Center, Alounsotsay Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Attapeu. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Take advantage of the hotel's car park. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer air conditioning, desk, fan, television, shower to ensure a restful night. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Attapeu has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Alounsotsay Hotel.
HotelFacilities: car park

Description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Attapeu City Center, Phoukham Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. All the necessary facilities, including car park, family room, smoking area, are at hand. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with non smoking rooms, air conditioning, desk, television, refrigerator. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Phoukham Hotel.
HotelFacilities: car park designated smoking area family room

Description: Stop at Dokchampa Hotel to discover the wonders of Attapeu. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Dokchampa Hotel. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, internet access  wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, satellite/cable TV, refrigerator. Access to the hotel's garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. For reliable service and professional staff, Dokchampa Hotel caters to your needs.
HotelFacilities: languages spoken Internet access things to do  ways to relax dining  drinking  and snacking services and conveniences access getting around available in all rooms

Description: Dokchampa Guest House is a popular choice amongst travelers in Attapeu, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. All the necessary facilities, including car park, family room, smoking area, are at hand. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer air conditioning, desk, fan, shower, complimentary bottled water to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Dokchampa Guest House.
HotelFacilities: languages spoken things to do  ways to relax services and conveniences for the kids getting around available in all rooms

Description: Siamphone Guesthouse is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Attapeu. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Take advantage of the hotel's luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, smoking area. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like non smoking rooms, air conditioning, desk, balcony/terrace, television. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including garden. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Attapeu has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Siamphone Guesthouse.

Address: Mekong Road Ban Don Khone01000 Ban KhonMuang Khong
Description:
Located in Ban Khon, Pans Residence offers a restaurant and Wi-Fi,

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning, an electric kettle and a fridge. Guests can enjoy river view and witness the sunset from the balcony.Guests can enjoy tea and coffee provided in the room for free. Private bathroom comes with a shower.

Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk and airport shuttle. The property offers free parking. Please note that a 3 to 5% surcharge applies for payments made with credit cards.

Please note that the hotel offers transfer from/to the Airport with additional costs. Guests are kindly requested to inform the property in advance if they wish to make use of this service. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

Address: 10 Road Ban Tha Ngone Vaythayny District 01000 Ban ThangonVaythayny District
Description:
A 5-minute drive from Nam Ngum River, Nonnevong Hotel offers comfortable rooms with air conditioning. Offering free Wi-Fi, it also has an on-site restaurant and parking facilities.

Nonnevong Hotel is a 40-minute drive from Wattay International Airport and a 50-minute drive from Ban Guen Zoo. Nam Ngum Dam is a 1-hour ride away.

All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a TV and a refrigerator. En suite bathrooms are fitted with shower facilities.

For convenience, the hotel provides a 24-hour front desk and safety deposit boxes. Shuttle service is also available upon request.

Guests can enjoy Lao and Thai cuisines served at Sabaidee Tha Ngone Restaurant.

Description:
Set in Champasak, Nakorn Cafe Guest House has a restaurant, bar, garden, and free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a childrens playground. There is free private parking and the property offers paid airport shuttle service.

At the guest house, each room is equipped with a balcony. At Nakorn Cafe Guest House the rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.

The accommodation offers a terrace. Guests at Nakorn Cafe Guest House will be able to enjoy activities in and around Champasak, like cycling.

Pakse is 34 km from the guest house. The nearest airport is Pakse International Airport, 29 km from Nakorn Cafe Guest House. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.

Set in Champasak, Nakorn River View has a restaurant, bar, garden, and free WiFi. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a childrens playground. There is free private parking and the property offers paid airport shuttle service.

At the guest house, all rooms have a patio with a river view. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Nakorn River View also have a lake view. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace.

Pakse is 34 km from Nakorn River View. The nearest airport is Pakse International Airport, 29 km from the guest house. Managed by a private host

Description:
Pon Arena Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi in public areas. The hotel features an outdoor pool, tour desk and shuttle service. Free public parking is possible on site.

The hotel is a 1.5-hr drive from Li Phi Waterfall. It is a 3-hr drive from Pakse Airport.

Rooms are fitted with a cable TV, safety deposit box and refrigerator. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a river view.

Guests can enjoy Laos and European cuisines at the restaurant.

Address: R3A Road Ban KhonekeoHouay XaiBokeo Province
Description:
Located in Houay Xai City at Slow Boat pier, Houay Xai Riverside Hotel a gateway to explore the varied sights and sounds of the Northern region. With easy access to the mountains, forests, rivers, ancient temples and colorful hilltribes, many of the regions major attractions are within a days journey from the Hotel. Featuring free WiFi, Houayxai Riverside Hotel (Phonevichit Guesthouse) offers accommodation in Ban Houayxay, a short walk from the ferry crossing to Thailand. Guests can enjoy meals at the on-site restaurant.

Each room at this property is air-conditioned and is fitted with a cable TV. Rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Chiang Saen is 34 km from Houayxai Riverside, while Golden Triangle is 35 km from the property. Please note that the property offers a free transfer from Houayxai Airport and The 4th Thai-Lao Friendship Bridge (Lao side) to the property. Guests are kindly requested to inform the property in advance if they wish to make use of this service. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.
HotelFacilities: Restaurant Terrace Non-smoking rooms Laundry facilities Family rooms Internet access Currency exchange Tour desk Tours/ticket assistance Free WiFi Free WiFi Air conditioning Public transport tickets

Address: Nakaraj Nakhon Ban Viengmai Huayxai Bokeo 01000 HuayxaiBokeo
Description:
The luxurious M Bokeo Hotel is located in Huayxai, Bokeo, 10 minutes from the town. A free pick-up and shuttle service to town is available. Guests can benefit from free access to WiFi and private parking.

Each air-conditioned room is fitted with a balcony with mountain view. Rooms come with cable TV, a minibar and coffee and tea facilities. The en-suite bathroom has a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Additional amenities include a mosquito net, a dressing room and a seating area.

At M Bokeo Hotel, breakfast can be served in your room upon request. You can enjoy freshly prepared snacks and dishes in the hotels à la carte restaurant or snack bar.

Guests can rent bicycles or cars to explore the surroundings. Other facilities offered at the property include shops (on site), a free airport shuttle and a terrace. The Laos Immigration is just 100 metres away. Please inform The M Bokeo Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please note that the hotel offers free transfer from the Laos Immigration to the hotel. Guests are kindly requested to inform the property in advance if they wish to make use of this service. Contact details can be found on the booking confirmation.

Looking out towards the Mekong River, Wangview Hotel offers accommodation in Ban Houayxay. Free WiFi is available in public areas.

It is 2.3 km from the towns centre and the Laos-Thai border cross ferry.

All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. They have air conditioning, a fridge and a balcony with river or mountain views.

Description:
Set conveniently in Ban Houayxay, Little Hostel offers cosy dormitory rooms with free WiFi. Various restaurants and shops can be found within walking distance.

The bunk beds all come with their own personal reading light and power socket. Guests have access to a shared bathroom and toilet facilities in the building.

At Little Hostel, the helpful staff at the reception are more than happy to provide any travel information and recommendations. Guests can also catch up with other visitors in the shared lounge area. For those wishing to explore the area, the hostel also provides bicycle rental services for a reasonable fee.

The hotel is located opposite The Gibbon Experience where guests can enjoy an exhilarating experience, zip-lining with the gibbons in the Nam Kan National Park. A small walk brings guests to a boat cruise port, where they can spend a relaxing afternoon enjoying the sights along the Mekong River. Please inform Little Hostel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

All guest rooms at the guest house come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. Guest rooms at Hom Pho Guesthouse feature air conditioning and a desk.

Chiang Khong is 1.5 km from the accommodation.

Rooms at this hotel feature wood furnishings and a heater. They are provided with a TV, a fridge and a fan. En suite bathrooms come with shower facilities. Select rooms have a private balcony.

A 24-hour front desk attends to guests needs throughout the day. Information on day trips and local attractions are available at the tour desk.

Guests can dine at Maly Restaurant, which serves a variety of Lao, Thai and European cuisines.

Simply furnished, each air-conditioned room is fitted with a TV with satellite channels, fan and fridge. Shower facilities are provided in an en suite bathroom.
